title: HyperLight Esports Recruiting Now!!!!
body:
Do you have a dream of becoming a Pro League of Legends player? Or be in a team to further your skills as player? Or have you ever dreampt about making a living off playing video games? 

If so read this post!

Hello Summoners, I am Tachia co-owner of HyperLight Esports, and we are looking for a roster to star in the upcoming challenger series.

HyperLight Esports is an aspiring esports organisation looking to break into the professional scene of League of Legends. As a whole we are intent on providing Oceanic talent with opportunity to make a career out of their passion for gaming. As an aspiring team we will be working together to get a roster of SoloQ talent to the professional level of the OPL. This is a long road and we understand that, but as a group we will work through the trials and tribulations, of being a team in a competetive environment, to make you become the best you can at your given role. This opportunity looms overhead for any aspiring player to take up. At this point in time we are currently looking for players of high platinum to challenger to take part in a trial process so that we can decide on a roster to be the face of HyperLight Esports League Of Legends division. 

To be elegable to apply for trials, at this point in time, you must:
•	Be of Plat3 or higher.
•	Main atleast 3 champions in your prefered role.
•	Preferably be over the age of 17.
•	Be mature.
•	Non-toxic.
•	Enjoy your role and enjoy playing League of Legends.
•	Have Teamspeak3 or Skype (preferably Teamspeak3).
•	Be willing to work as a team.
•	Be willing to practice 3-4 times a week for minimum of 2 and a half hours per day.

If you feel you fit this criterea then please feel free to leave the following in the comments:
Summoner Name:
Rank (As of the time of the comment):
Main Role:
Top 3 Champions in that Role:
Age:
Ts3 or Skype (Y/N):
Availablity of hours:

I have typed the application here for your convenience, so all you have to do is copy, paste and fill out the information. I will be checking the comments often so that I can chat to you all and get intial introductions and queries out of the way.

Thank you for reading this post and I hope to hear from some of you soon.


Regards, 

Tachia
